ygData.msgSnippet: Damn it! Just when I sit down to get into the battle Yan has to pull out. This isnt over! Megatron watched the Predacons pull out, or retreat, or do whatever

    Damn it! Just when I sit down to get into the battle Yan has to pull out. 
This isnt over!

    Megatron watched the Predacons pull out, or retreat, or do whatever they 
were going to do. As he recived the information on thier base status, he was 
tempted to follow them, and crush them durring there brief confusion. But, 
looking at the smoldering woods and his hurt predacons he put that thought on 
hold.
    "Return to base. Victory is ours once agian. Next time we meet with 
Killfests bunch, they will not live to see another battle. It will end next 
time." He said, looking off into the distance, some what entranced.

    As for the Energonians, they watched them go. The foursome landed and 
regrouped briefly. Putnam spoke first: "we will follow them! They will not 
get away with such a dishonorable escape."
    Akron nodded. Odiphious, with a solem face reminded them of Ominous with 
the girl, but Putnam put to rest his worries. The four of them turned towrd 
the fleeing Predacons and pressed after them, taking to the air for a hasty 
pursuit. All the while they would send blast after blast at them.
